Definition at line 3788 of file TsvFile.cpp.

#define TSV_SPLIT_VEC_BODY ( TYPE   ) 

Value:

int rv=affx::TSV_OK;                            \
  string::size_type pos1;                         \
  string::size_type pos2;                         \
  char* pos_out;                                  \
  TYPE val;                                       \
                                                  \
  vec->clear();                                   \
                                                  \
  if (m_buffer=="") {                             \
    return rv;                                    \
  }                                               \
                                                  \
  pos1=0;                                         \
  while (1) {                                     \
    pos2=m_buffer.find(sep,pos1);                 \
    if (pos2==string::npos) {                     \
      val=CONVERT_FUNC();                         \
      vec->push_back(val);                        \
      break;                                      \
    } else {                                      \
      val=CONVERT_FUNC();                         \
      vec->push_back(val);                        \
      pos1=pos2+1;                                \
    }                                             \
  }                                               \
  return rv;
